name: [Sign-in] Validate Adding and Editing the Shipping Address on Checkout and Payment Review pages

steps.name: And user should be able to cleanup any previously added address in Profile page
And there is grapevineWreath product added in the cart
And User will select ship to me as the shipping method
When User should click on checkout button
Then User should be able to add or edit the shipping address on the "Checkout" page
And User should be able to delete the newly added address in Profile page
When user is on cart page
And User should click on checkout button
And User will click on payment and order review button
Then User should be able to add or edit the shipping address on the "Payment Review" page
